Result.Title: Development and validation of the Diabetes Numeracy Test (DNT)

Result.Abstract:
Responsiveness-to-intervention (RTI) is a method for both preventing and helping to identify learning disabilities. An important
 feature is its multi-tier structure: primary intervention (tier 1) refers to classroom instruction; secondary intervention (tier 2) usually involves more intensive pullout, small-group instruction; and tertiary intervention (tier 3) typically denotes most intensive special education.
